heading: Suspense in motion pictures, television, etc..
general-note: Here are entered works on the use of suspense in motion pictures, television programs, and video recordings. Works about films or television programs that feature a build up of suspense, tension, uncertainty, menace, and anxiety as primary elements and in which the audience is kept on tenterhooks are entered under the appropriate specific heading, e.g.. Thrillers (Motion pictures); Thrillers (Television programs). subdivided by the appropriate geographic, topical, and/or form subdivisions..
